manifest_name.message: FetchV - Video Downloader for m3u8 & hls

manifest_description.message: Easily save online videos such as m3u8, live streams, mp4, webm, etc. to your computer.

popup_option_size_tooltip.message: Resources with sizes below the lower limit or above the upper limit will not be captured. The unit is KB. Set to 0 for no limit.

popup_option_tooltip.message: Resources from the following domains will not be captured

popup_option_tip_record.message: Show tip when using recording mode

popup_play_tip.message: Some videos may not be captured if not played.

popup_no_resource_lead.message: Some videos may need to be played first in order to be captured. If resources cannot be captured even after playing, try using the recording mode for downloading.

popup_disable.message: Sorry, we are unable to download videos from this page.

popup_item_block.message: Filter all resources from this domain

popup_item_block_error.message: You can only block up to 30 domains!

popup_item_block_modal_content.message: Are you sure you want to block all resources from this domain? After blocking, you can manage this option in the settings.

popup_no_resource_bottom.message: If your target video is not in the list or if the video cannot be downloaded successfully, you can use the recording mode for downloading.

popup_record_modal_content.message: If the current video has selectable quality options, make sure to choose a fixed quality instead of auto. Otherwise, in poor network conditions, the automatic quality switching may result in a recorded video with multiple different resolutions.

page_no_data.message: No data detected by the application!

page_cancel_modal_content.message: Are you sure you want to cancel this task? The data will not be recoverable after cancellation!

page_chunks_list_title.message: The video has been segmented due to receiving data of different resolutions or reaching the data chunk limit.

page_option_thread_tooltip.message: The more threads, the faster the download, but overly fast download speeds may result in request errors. In such cases, choose fewer threads.

page_option_preview_tooltip.message: When enabled, the video preview will be displayed during the download.

page_option_auto_save_tooltip.message: Automatically initiate the save when the download is complete.

page_option_tab_progress_tooltip.message: When enabled, the progress will be displayed on the current tab.

page_option_resolution_tooltip.message: Available when the source m3u8 file provides multiple resolutions. The default is to download the highest resolution.

page_error_pause.message: The task has been automatically paused due to more than 30 error requests. Try reducing the download threads and resume.

page_option_clear_cache_tooltip.message: After saving the file, clear the cache

page_live_chunks_tips.message: Due to exceeding the limit, the recording has been refreshed and restarted. The completed portions have been archived. Please save them as soon as possible to free up memory and avoid memory depletion!

page_option_default_resolution_tooltip.message: When this option is enabled, the next time you download, if the target has this resolution available, it will be automatically selected.
